channel.title: New to 508's...help
channel.description:
Im new to 508's as you read on the subject... and im wondering how to give myself a position. Such as owner, admin, moderator. Another question is how to add commands, like uhm... ::giveadmin or something like that, if you can answer any of my questions that would be very very helpful, thank you.
-Greg

item.title: New to 508's...help
item.dc:creator: @cocky cocky
item.description:
@cocky wrote:

for commands… there in
src/net/com/codeusa/net/packethandler/commands.java
or something like that… (the 508 i coded anyway…)

Read full topic

item.title: New to 508's...help
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

For your first question, you can check login.java for ‘rights = 2;’ or manually change it by opening your character file with WORDPAD (not notepad) and changing the rights.

Read full topic
